metadata.feature_description: Tests that the AccountSettings UI loads and displays correctly

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Verify HTML template loads without errors

steps.action: Navigate to PersonaBar and click on Accounts menu item
steps.expected: Accounts panel should load and display AccountSettings.html content
steps.actual: Clicking on Accounts menu item does not load the Accounts panel - Extensions panel remains displayed

steps.action: Verify AccountSettings.html file is accessible via HTTP request
steps.actual: File is accessible (HTTP 200) and contains expected HTML content

issues: PersonaBar navigation to Accounts panel does not work - clicking menu item does not load the panel

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' text displays

steps.action: Attempt to view Accounts panel to verify h2 text content
steps.expected: Text 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.' should be visible in the UI
steps.actual: Panel does not load in UI. Verified via DOM parsing that the text exists in the HTML file: 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.'

issues: Text cannot be verified visually because Accounts panel does not load in PersonaBar UI

steps.action: Attempt to view Accounts panel to verify Save button
steps.expected: Save button with class 'primarybtn' should be visible
steps.actual: Panel does not load in UI. Verified via DOM parsing that Save button exists in HTML with class 'primarybtn' and text 'Save'

issues: Save button cannot be verified visually because Accounts panel does not load in PersonaBar UI

test_scenarios.scenario_name: Check extensions div container is present

steps.action: Attempt to view Accounts panel to verify extensions div
steps.expected: Div with id 'tabs-extensions' and class 'personabar-extensions' should be present
steps.actual: Panel does not load in UI. Verified via DOM parsing that div exists with id 'tabs-extensions' and class 'personabar-extensions'

issues: Extensions div cannot be verified visually because Accounts panel does not load in PersonaBar UI

steps.action: Fetch AccountSettings.js and verify AMD module structure
steps.expected: JavaScript file should use RequireJS define() with proper module structure
steps.actual: AccountSettings.js contains proper AMD define() with jQuery dependency, init function, load function, and correct exports

steps.action: Attempt to load Accounts panel to verify JavaScript module execution
steps.expected: Module init and load functions should execute without errors
steps.actual: Cannot verify runtime execution because Accounts panel does not load in PersonaBar UI. File structure verification passed - init and load functions are properly defined

issues: Cannot verify JavaScript module execution at runtime because panel does not load

observations: The Accounts menu item is visible in PersonaBar with text 'nav_Accounts' (resource key displayed instead of localized text, suggesting localization issue)
Clicking on the Accounts menu item does not load the Accounts panel - the Extensions panel remains displayed
All module files (HTML, JS, CSS) are correctly deployed and accessible via HTTP requests
HTML file contains expected elements: h2 with 'Hello World, This is Site Settings.', div with id 'tabs-extensions', and Save button with class 'primarybtn'
JavaScript file uses proper AMD/RequireJS module format with init and load functions
First click on Accounts menu caused navigation to a page showing 'You do not have access to view this page within the site' and logged out the user (see Module_UI_Loading_step02_access_denied.png)
The module appears to be correctly installed but PersonaBar panel loading mechanism is not functioning for this module
